name: Accident
description: Contains information about accidents related to patient injuries or emergency department visits

ACC.1.name: Accident Date/Time
ACC.1.description: Date and time when the accident occurred

ACC.2.name: Accident Code
ACC.2.description: Code indicating the type of accident

ACC.5.name: Accident Job Related Indicator
ACC.5.description: Indicates if accident was job related

ACC.6.name: Accident Death Indicator
ACC.6.description: Indicates if accident resulted in death

notes: All ACC fields are optional but provide important context for emergency and trauma cases
Typically used in emergency department and trauma center workflows
Supports workers compensation and auto insurance claim processing
